invokermod:Quas.NAME: Quas
invokermod:Quas.DESCRIPTION: Add a Cold Orb to your orb slots. NL Each Cold Orb heals you for !M! HP when you deal damage. NL Exhaust.

invokermod:Wex.NAME: Wex
invokermod:Wex.DESCRIPTION: Add a Lightning Orb to your orb slots. NL Each Lightning Orb lets you draw !M! card when you play a card. NL Exhaust.

invokermod:Exort.NAME: Exort
invokermod:Exort.DESCRIPTION: Add a Fire Orb to your orb slots. NL Each Fire Orb grants you !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

invokermod:Invoke.NAME: Invoke
invokermod:Invoke.DESCRIPTION: Create a spell based on your current orbs. NL Exhaust.

invokermod:ColdSnap.NAME: Cold Snap
invokermod:ColdSnap.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Requires: 3 Cold Orbs. NL Exhaust.

invokermod:EMP.NAME: EMP
invokermod:EMP.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [E] for each enemy. NL Requires: 3 Lightning Orbs. NL Exhaust.
invokermod:EMP.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [E] for each enemy. NL Requires: 3 Lightning Orbs. NL Exhaust.

invokermod:SunStrike.NAME: Sun Strike
invokermod:SunStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Requires: 3 Fire Orbs. NL Exhaust.

invokermod:GhostWalk.NAME: Ghost Walk
invokermod:GhostWalk.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! Dexterity. NL Requires: 2 Cold Orbs and 1 Lightning Orb. NL Exhaust.

invokermod:IceWall.NAME: Ice Wall
invokermod:IceWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain Block equal to twice your Strength. NL Requires: 2 Cold Orbs and 1 Fire Orb. NL Exhaust.

invokermod:Alacrity.NAME: Alacrity
invokermod:Alacrity.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity. NL Requires: 2 Lightning Orbs and 1 Fire Orb. NL Exhaust.
invokermod:Alacrity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain 2 Strength and 2 Dexterity. NL Requires: 2 Lightning Orbs and 1 Fire Orb. NL Exhaust.

invokermod:Tornado.NAME: Tornado
invokermod:Tornado.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 3 times. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Requires: 2 Lightning Orbs and 1 Cold Orb. NL Exhaust.

invokermod:ForgeSpirit.NAME: Forge Spirit
invokermod:ForgeSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL If the enemy has Block, deal !D! damage again. NL Requires: 2 Fire Orbs and 1 Cold Orb. NL Exhaust.

invokermod:ChaosMeteor.NAME: Chaos Meteor
invokermod:ChaosMeteor.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies. NL Requires: 2 Fire Orbs and 1 Lightning Orb. NL Exhaust.
